I've watched an anime that was adapted from their manga.
So, what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>anime</color> do you like?

content:
When I was little, during times when the shop had no commissions,
I'd occasionally get the chance to watch some anime,
and I'd always pick this type.

content:
I saw it once before,
but I didn't quite understand it. Perhaps during my school years,
I was learning how to skillfully use the "Guaishou."

content:

so I should be able to watch something.

content:
